parameters.name: sort
parameters.description: sort the response by specified parameter

post.description: Get a list of DDOs that match with the executed query.

get.description: Get DDO of a particular asset

put.description: Update DDO of an existing asset

default.description: Get metadata of a particular asset

parameters.name: query
parameters.description: execute directly queries to elasticsearch from the client

parameters.name: sort
parameters.description: sort the response by specified parameter

200.description: Return all bookmark from a user

creator.description: Wallet address who created the proof signature

owner.description: Wallet address who own the public key

numVotes.description: Number of votes. 0 is the default value

rating.description: Decimal value between 0 and 1. 0 is the default value

schema.description: Schema applied to calculate the rating

isListed.description: Flag unsuitable content. False by default. If it's true, the content must not be returned

checksum.description: Checksum of the file using your preferred format (i.e. MD5). Format specified in checksumType.If it's not provided can't be validated if the file was not modified after registering

url.description: Content URL. Omitted from the remote metadata. Supports http(s):// and ipfs:// URLs

checksumType.description: Format of the provided checksum. Can vary according to server (i.e Amazon vs. Azure)

compression.description: File compression (e.g. no, gzip, bzip2, etc)

contentLength.description: Size of the file in bytes

resourceId.description: Remote identifier of the file in the external provider. It is typically the remote id in the cloud provider

encrypted.description: Boolean. Is the file encrypted? If is not set is assumed the file is not encrypted

encryptionMode.description: Encryption mode used. Just valid if encrypted=true

entrypoint.description: The command to execute, or script to run inside the Docker image

language.description: Language used to implement the software

container.description: Object describing the Docker container image

author.description: Name of the entity generating this data (e.g. Tfl, Disney Corp, etc.)

dateCreated.description: The date on which the asset was created by the originator.ISO 8601 format, Coordinated Universal Time, e.g. 2019-01-31T08:38:32Z

datePublished.description: The date on which the asset DDO is registered into the metadata store

files.description: Array of File objects including the encrypted file urls. Further metadata about each file is stored

license.description: Short name referencing the license of the asset (e.g. Public Domain, CC-0, CC-BY, No License Specified, etc.). If it's not specified, the following value will be added: "No License Specified

name.description: Descriptive name or title of the asset

price.description: Price of the asset. It must be an integer encoded as a string, e.g. "123000000000000000000"

type.description: Type of the asset. Helps to filter by the type of asset. It could be for example ("dataset", "algorithm")

publicKey.description: Public keys that contains the asset

additionalInformation.description: Weather information of UK including temperature and humidity

created.description: Date when the asset is created

updated.description: Date when the asset is created

publicKey.description: Public keys that contains the asset

additionalInformation.description: Weather information of UK including temperature and humidity

query.description: execute directly queries to elasticsearch from the client

sort.description: sort the response by specified parameter

publicKey.description: Public keys that contains the asset

additionalInformation.description: Weather information of UK including temperature and humidity

userId.description: The userId who created the bookmark
